text: Barrier: %+n% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units

Charge bonus: %+n for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Forsaken of Tzeentch, Tzaangors, Centigors of Tzeentch, Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chosen of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units

Speed: %+n% for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Forsaken of Tzeentch, Tzaangors, Centigors of Tzeentch, Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chosen of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
